Series 1.question:
What will be the final value of count?

count = 12
WHILE count >= 3
    count = count - 3
END WHILE

How many times will the loop execute?

x = 1
WHILE x < 10
    x = x + 2
END WHILE

What is the output of the loop?

y = 5
WHILE y < 20
    y = y + 5
END WHILE
PRINT y

What is the final value of num?

num = 2
WHILE num < 50
    num = num * 2
END WHILE

What is printed?

val = 1
WHILE val <= 5
    val = val + 1
END WHILE
PRINT val

What is the value of sum after the loop?

sum = 0
count = 1
WHILE count <= 4
    sum = sum + count
    count = count + 1
END WHILE

How many times will the loop run?

i = 10
WHILE i > 0
    i = i - 2
END WHILE

What will be the last printed number?

n = 1
WHILE n < 15
    PRINT n
    n = n + 3
END WHILE

Which value does counter hold after loop ends?

counter = 3
WHILE counter < 20
    counter = counter + 4
END WHILE

What is the output?

n = 100
WHILE n > 25
    n = n - 25
END WHILE
PRINT n

How many times does the loop execute?

count = 1
WHILE count < 20
    count = count * 3
END WHILE

What will be printed?

x = 0
WHILE x < 12
    x = x + 4
END WHILE
PRINT x

Which number will be the final result?

y = 81
WHILE y > 9
    y = y / 3
END WHILE

What is the sum after loop ends?

s = 0
n = 1
WHILE n <= 3
    s = s + (n * n)
    n = n + 1
END WHILE

How many values of n will be printed?

n = 2
WHILE n <= 20
    PRINT n
    n = n + 6
END WHILE

What value does result hold?

result = 1
num = 1
WHILE num <= 3
    result = result * num
    num = num + 1
END WHILE

What is the final value of count?

count = 50
WHILE count > 5
    count = count - 15
END WHILE

Which number will be printed last?

n = 1
WHILE n < 25
    PRINT n
    n = n * 2
END WHILE

What is printed?

x = 3
WHILE x < 15
    x = x + 4
END WHILE
PRINT x

How many times does the loop execute?

val = 128
WHILE val > 1
    val = val / 2
END WHILE
